prompt: I need to see my schedule and communications RIGHT NOW. First, show me my calendar events for today immediately—pull them from my calendar, NOT just the date. Then, check my inbox for any unread emails; I can't afford to miss something urgent. After that, search all emails for the 'Atlas' project ASAP. I don't have time for delays—do these three actions EXACTLY in this order: 1) get calendar events for today, 2) get unread emails, 3) search emails for 'Atlas'. No extra steps. DO NOT fetch the current date first—just get the calendar events directly.
